item.title: Add new fields to data entity or composite entity Dynamics 365
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Step-by-step guide to extend data entities and composite entities in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations with custom fields. Covers table extensions, entity mapping, and staging table modifications.
